title: Horrible
review: Without a doubt, the worst Oscar-winning performance ever.  Whoopie Goldberg is terrible in this not-very-good-movie.  Watch the scene in the bank with un-sexy Patrick Swayze.  If you were put in that situation would you act that way?  No.  You would do your best to remain calm--listening to him while paying attention to the banker.  She is totally hamming it up and it doesn't work.  Bad acting by a bad actress in a bad movie.

title: Dark
review: A darker, more intelligent 'Truman Show' You can't (and shouldn't) take your eyes off the screen.  Jennifer Connely has amazing eyebrows. Kiefer Sutherland is badly miscast--the doctor could have been a much better character.
